item.description:
A good friend that I've sailed with has a 36 foot Catalina sailboat in Jamestown, RI and is inviting 5 more people to sail for the day Saturday in this beautiful harbor.  .

Cost is $72.33 per day.

Again, you do not have to stay overnight.

This boat is equipped with tons of safety features including gps, several radios, safety lines etc..

There is a toilet on the boat too!

more info to follow soon....
item.how_to_find_us: My cell on the day of the trip is 617-894-8454
item.name: Sailing 36' Boat - Jamestown, R.I. with option to stay over Sat night Cuttyhunk
